## WeakValueMap.forEach() method

Call a function for each entry of the map.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
forEach(callback: (value: V, key: K, map: WeakValueMap<K, V>) => void, thisArg?: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | (value: V, key: K, map: [WeakValueMap](./weak-value-map.weakvaluemap.md)<!-- -->&lt;K, V&gt;) =&gt; void |  |
|  thisArg | any | <i>(Optional)</i> |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
